co.eightysixpercent.bot.manager

Class EPManager

  • co.eightysixpercent.bot.manager.EPManager

  • public class EPManager

    This manager is the 86% SDK entry point.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static EPManager INSTANCE
      This manager is the 86% SDK entry point.
      static int apiVersion
      The current EightySixPercent API version.

    • Field Detail

      • apiVersion

        public static int apiVersion

        The current EightySixPercent API version.

      • INSTANCE

        public static EPManager INSTANCE

        This manager is the 86% SDK entry point.

    • Method Detail

      • getEnableAnalytics

        public boolean getEnableAnalytics()

      • setEnableAnalytics

        public void setEnableAnalytics(boolean p)

      • init

        public void init(android.app.Application application,
                 EPManagerInterface botCustomManagerInterface,
                 boolean enableLogs,
                 boolean enableAnalytics)

        Initializes the EPManager. It must be called in order to have the bots working.

        Parameters:
        application - the application initializing the SDK
        botCustomManagerInterface - The object that will receive the EPManager events.
        enableLogs - If set to true the 86% SDK logs will be displayed in the console. Default value is false.
        enableAnalytics - If set to true the 86% SDK will send analytics visible on the Bot Editor. Default value is true.

      • getTimingConfiguration

        public EPTimingConfiguration getTimingConfiguration()

        Allows the customization of the timing with which the message are displayed

        Returns:
        The TimingConfiguration object that can be modified

      • clearChatConversation

        public void clearChatConversation(android.content.Context context,
                                  java.lang.String chatConversationId)

        Clears a chat conversation and associated data.

        Parameters:
        chatConversationId - the id of the chat conversation you want to erase

      • clearData

        public void clearData(android.app.Application application)

        Clears all chat conversations and associated data. To be called, for example, when you log a user out.

      • restartChatConversation

        public void restartChatConversation(android.content.Context context,
                                    java.lang.String chatConversationId,
                                    java.lang.String botUuid,
                                    java.util.List<co.eightysixpercent.bot.model.EPContextObject> contextUpdate,
                                    boolean replaceContext,
                                    kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super java.lang.Exception,kotlin.Unit> completion)

        Clears a chat conversation and associated data and restart it with the now botUuid and botContext infos.

        Parameters:
        context - the associated context
        chatConversationId - the id of the chat conversation you want to erase
        botUuid - the unique id of the bot to start
        contextUpdate - the conversation context to be updated
        replaceContext - clear the conversation context if set to true
        completion - called with null if everything went well else called with an error

      • registerBot

        public void registerBot(java.lang.String uuid,
                        EPBotFetchingStrategy fetchingStrategy)

        Registers a new bot to the EPManager.

        Parameters:
        uuid - The UUID of the bot to register.
        fetchingStrategy - The fetching strategy to use to get the bot when you're about to open a controller.

      • isBotRegistered

        public boolean isBotRegistered(java.lang.String uuid)

        Check if a bot was registered.

        Parameters:
        uuid - The UUID of the bot to register.
        Returns:
        true if the bot is already registered

      • refreshRegisteredBots

        public void refreshRegisteredBots()

        Check if a new version for the registered bots is available on the server and download it

      • getChatConversation

        public EPChatConversation getChatConversation(java.lang.String id)

        Get an existing chat conversation for a given id.

        Parameters:
        id - The id of the existing chat conversation to get.
        Returns:
        The matching chat conversation object or null if it was not found.

      • fragment

        public void fragment(android.content.Context context,
                     EPChatConversation conversation,
                     kotlin.jvm.functions.Function2<? super co.eightysixpercent.bot.fragment.EPChatConversationFragment,? super java.lang.Exception,kotlin.Unit> completion)

        Creates a fragment for the given chat conversation.

        Parameters:
        context - The associated context.
        conversation - The chat conversation to be displayed in the fragment.
        completion - Callback called when the chat conversation fragment is ready to be used.

      • runBotOnChatConversation

        public void runBotOnChatConversation(android.content.Context context,
                                     EPChatConversation chatConversation,
                                     java.lang.String botUuid,
                                     java.util.List<co.eightysixpercent.bot.model.EPContextObject> contextUpdate,
                                     boolean replaceContext,
                                     kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super java.lang.Exception,kotlin.Unit> completion)

        Runs a bot on the given chat conversation.

        Parameters:
        context - The associated context.
        chatConversation - The chat conversation on which to run the bot.
        botUuid - The UUID of the bot to run.
        contextUpdate - A list of context objects to use to update the chat conversation context. Default value is an empty list.
        replaceContext - If set to true, the current conversation context will first be cleared before add the given context objects.
        completion - Called when the bot has been started on the chat conversation.
